title: Employee Calls in Sick
description: A front desk agent calls in sick for their shift, and the manager needs to find a replacement.

tasks.description: The manager logs the employee's absence in the scheduling system.
The manager uses the system to find available employees who are not scheduled and can cover the shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of available staff.

tasks.description: The manager contacts an available employee who agrees to take the shift, and updates the schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shift is covered, and the schedule is updated.
